summary: Tested 4 features from the fork session: CPF bug fix, phone mask, certificate upload, and Comunidade Tradicional field. All 4 features passed testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 4 features from this session are working correctly. The app routes are: /admin/staff for servers, /admin/students for students.

feature_1_cpf_bug_fix.description: CPF field is correctly populated when editing a server
feature_1_cpf_bug_fix.evidence: When editing server 'RICLEIDE DA SILVA GONÇALVES', CPF field shows '007.724.252-13'

feature_2_phone_mask.description: Phone mask (99) 99999-9999 is applied automatically when typing in Celular field

feature_3_certificate_upload.description: Upload certificate button is visible next to each formação/especialização entry
feature_3_certificate_upload.evidence: After adding 'Licenciatura em Pedagogia', upload icon (lucide-upload) appears

feature_4_comunidade_tradicional.description: Comunidade Tradicional field exists in student form with all required options
feature_4_comunidade_tradicional.evidence: Options found: Selecione, Não Pertence, Quilombola, Cigano, Ribeirinho, Extrativista

screenshots_taken: 04_edit_staff_modal.png - Edit server modal showing CPF field populated
05_phone_mask_test.png - Phone mask applied to Celular field
07_formacao_added.png - Formação added with upload button visible
09_new_student_modal.png - New student modal showing Comunidade Tradicional field
